TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Activity extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示具有要用于日志记录的上下文的操作。

span.span: Represents an operation with context to be used for logging.

remarks.format: `Activity`包含操作名称、ID、开始时间和持续时间、标记和行李。An `Activity` has an operation name, an ID, a start time and duration, tags, and baggage. 当前活动可以通过静态属性访问。The current activity can be accessed with the static property. 应通过调用构造函数来创建活动, 并根据需要进行配置, 然后使用方法 (该方法维护活动和集的父子关系) 启动。Activities should be created by calling the constructor, configured as necessary, and then started with the method, which maintains parent-child relationships for the activities and sets . 活动完成后, 应使用方法停止。When an activity is finished, it should be stopped with the method. 没有`Activity`方法允许将异常转义为对错误输入的响应。No `Activity` methods allow exceptions to escape as a response to bad inputs. 引发和捕获它们 (允许调试器和监视器查看错误), 但异常被取消, 并且操作具有合理的功能 (通常不执行任何操作)。They are thrown and caught (which allows debuggers and monitors to see the error), but the exception is suppressed, and the operation does something reasonable (typically it does nothing).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string operationName) cil managed

span.span: The name of the operation.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意 , 具有 "生成器" 模式: 调用构造函数、多个`Set*`和`Add*` api, 然后调用来生成活动。Note that has a "builder" pattern: you call the constructor, a number of `Set*` and `Add*` APIs, and then call to build the activity. 使用新实例之前, 必须调用。You **must** call before using the new instance.

summary.span: 获取键/值对的集合，它表示传递给此 的子元素的信息。

span.span: Gets a collection of key/value pairs that represents information that is passed to children of this .

value.span: 字符串字符串键值对的枚举。

span.span: An enumeration of string-string key-value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Baggage`当请求离开进程时 (连同 ID), 将序列化。`Baggage` is serialized when requests leave the process (along with the ID). 通常, `Baggage`用于精细控制活动和任何子项的日志记录。Typically, `Baggage` is used for fine-grained control over logging of the activity and any children. 通常, 如果在运行时不使用数据, 则应改用。In general, if you are not using the data at runtime, you should be using instead.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的默认 ID 格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the default ID format for the .

remarks.format: `Activity`实例尝试对 id 使用与父实例相同的格式。The `Activity` instance tries to use the same format for IDs as its parent. 如果活动没有父级, 则此属性将确定要使用的默认格式。If the activity has no parent, this property determines the default format to use.

span.span: to always use the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: 通常, 如果定义了, 则其格式将确定当前所使用的格式。Normally if the is defined, its format determines the format used by the current . 但是, 如果`ForceDefaultFormat`将设置为`true`, 则即使定义了并且父具有不同的格式, ID 格式也始终由属性定义。However, if `ForceDefaultFormat` is set to `true`, the ID format is always defined by the property even if the is defined and the parent has a different format.

summary.span: 获取特定请求专属的标识符。

span.span: Gets an identifier that is specific to a particular request.
The activity ID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ID 具有层次结构: `root-id.id1_id2.id3_`。An ID has a hierarchical structure: `root-id.id1_id2.id3_`. 当通过 `Activity.Parent.Id`向或附加后缀来调用时, 将生成 ID。The ID is generated when is called by appending a suffix to the `Activity.Parent.Id` or the . 在开始之前没有 ID。An has no ID until it starts. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[Id 格式](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/ActivityUserGuide.md#id-format)。For more information, see [Id Format](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/ActivityUserGuide.md#id-format).

public: property System::String ^ OperationName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取操作名称。

span.span: Gets the operation name.
The name of the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 操作名称是适用于分组/筛选的*益处*名称。An operation name is the *coarsest* name that is useful for grouping/filtering. 该名称通常是编译时常量。The name is typically a compile-time constant. Rest Api 的名称是合理的, 但参数 (如特定帐户) 不应在名称中, 而应在标记中。Names of Rest APIs are reasonable, but arguments (such as specific accounts) should not be in the name but rather in the tags.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此的父级来自进程外, 则没有父级, 但*可能*具有父 ID (从父 ID 反序列化)。If the parent for this comes from outside the process, the does not have a parent but *may* have a parent ID (which was deserialized from the parent). 如果这是一个根`null` (即它没有), 则此属性值可以为。This property value can be `null` if this is a root (i.e. it has no ). 有关更多详细信息, 请参阅[Id 格式](href="https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/ActivityUserGuide.md#id-format")。See [Id Format](href="https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/ActivityUserGuide.md#id-format") for more details.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根 ID 是 "|" 之间的 或中的子字符串(或开头) 和第一个`.`。The root ID is a substring from the or the ) between '|' (or the beginning) and the first `.`. 按根 ID 筛选允许您查找操作处理中涉及的所有活动。Filtering by root ID allows you to find all activities involved in operation processing. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[ID 格式](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/ActivityUserGuide.md#id-format)。For more information, see [ID Format](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/ActivityUserGuide.md#id-format).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Start`调用方法会执行以下操作:Calling the `Start` method does the following: - 要 保存的设置。Sets to hold . - 将设置为此。Sets to this . - 如果以前未设置, 则将其设置为。If was not set previously, sets it to . - 为此活动生成唯一。Generates a unique for this activity. 使用启动并写入开始事件。Use to start the and write the start event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TraceStateString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TraceStateString : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取 W3C 标头。

span.span: Gets the W3C header.
The W3C header.

remarks.format: `tracestate`标头用于携带补充信息来跟踪包含在跟踪父级中的标识。The `tracestate` header is intended to carry supplemental information to trace identity contained in the trace parent. `tracestate`包含键/值对的列表, 这些键/值对在多个分布式跟踪关系图中传达有关请求位置的信息。`tracestate` consists of a list of key/value pairs that convey information about the request position in multiple distributed tracing graphs. 此信息通常由分布式跟踪系统使用, 不应用于常规用途行李, 因为这可能会破坏分布式跟踪的相关性。This information is typically used by distributed tracing systems and should not be used for general purpose baggage, since this may break the correlation of a distributed trace. 逻辑`TraceStateString`上只是一种行李 (如果流类似于行李), 但由于它应采用特殊大小写方式 (它有自己的 HTTP 标头), 因此, 如果它不能与其他行李 lumped, 则更方便/有效。Logically `TraceStateString` is just a kind of baggage (if flows just like baggage), but because it is expected to be special-cased (it has its own HTTP header), it is more convenient/efficient if it is not lumped in with other baggage.
